name: @tq-bit/node-red-contrib-trace-messages
description: Node to track and aggregate messages over your flows

scripts.release: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && npm publish --access public
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor --no-git-tag-version && npm publish --access public
scripts.release:major: npm version major --no-git-tag-version && npm publish --access public

author: tobi@q-bit.me
